body: If i am banned from the server am i still aloud to interact with the Forums if it is a no i will kindly leave and if it is permitted then id gladly stay with this community.
body_tagged: If i am banned from the server am i still aloud to interact with the Forums if it is a no i will kindly leave and if it is permitted then id gladly stay with this community.
title: Question for the Staff

replies.body: You are allowed to view and post on the forums, even when youre banned in-game.
replies.body_tagged: You are allowed to view and post on the forums, even when youre banned in-game.

replies.body: Many banned players still interact with the forums, it's fine.
replies.body_tagged: Many banned players still interact with the forums, it's fine.

replies.body: Only users that have been web-banned (whether it be temporary or permanent) do not have access.
replies.body_tagged: Only users that have been web-banned (whether it be temporary or permanent) do not have access.
